TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNamespaceMapping extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

Docs.summary: Declares a mapping between a uniform resource identifier (URI) and a prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To declare a mapping between a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and a prefix, create an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping> class and add it to an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection> object that is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> for a binding.
